content:
The subject is about business systems and this is the background of the lesson. This is the background of the lesson: 
In order to develop a career in the working world its important to know how businesses operate. This unit focuses on business systems and analyses the smooth running of operations across different industries and businesses. 

Learners will: 

Understanding the protocols of systems in business settings
Analyse different operational systems and their effectiveness on business
Understand HR systems and their impact on a business, including tasks such as work appraisals, objective setting, operational planning, scheduling rotas etc.
explore the key theory that underpins the subject of content writing and development
understand the history of social media
enabling learners to write compelling social media posts.

Learning will be practical wherever possible. Much of it will take place by solving problems through designing systems.

Part of the assessment process includes learners creating a group presentation to solve an issue within a business by creating a new system (Assessment 1). This will enable learners to show their understanding of reflection, evaluation and creation skills . 
The other assessment (Assessment 2) will follow after the presentation, this will include a summary report and reflection on the presentation.

These are the learning objectives: 
Understand what kinds of business systems exist across a range of sectors
1.1 Understand what is meant by a system
1.2 Describe different types of system used in business.

Understand why systems are important and what can go wrong
2.1 Identify situations where a system might be useful
2.2 Explain how and why different systems fail.

Be able to implement a system
3.1 Understand the basics of systems architecture
3.2 Develop systems of their own in particular scenarios.

Be able to operate a standard HR system
4.1 Explore the case of systems in HR
4.2 Evaluate the different stakeholders and users in a HR system.

These are the target audience: 

Business Administrator
Receptionist
Office Manager

I want you to create a lesson plan with 2-3 aims, module learning outcomes, the time required per topic, content (key points in paragraph form),discussing the following: 
-What are HR Systems? 
-Different Types of Systems in HR / Different stakeholders and users in a HR System
- Group presentations- evaluate these stakeholders
